    • insertIntoCustomersTable

      public static int insertIntoCustomersTable(String customerName, String address, String Phone, String postalCode, int divisionID) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new customer record into the customers table.
      Parameters:
      customerName - the name of the customer
      address - the address of the customer
      Phone - the phone number of the customer
      postalCode - the postal code of the customer's location
      divisionID - the ID of the division associated with the customer's location
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the SQL statement
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement

    • updateCustomersTable

      public static int updateCustomersTable(int customerID, String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String Phone, int divisionID) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing customer record in the customers table.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer record to update
      customerName - the updated name of the customer
      address - the updated address of the customer
      postalCode - the updated postal code of the customer's location
      Phone - the updated phone number of the customer
      divisionID - the updated ID of the division associated with the customer's location
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the SQL statement
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement
